pageSetting.title: 贷款利息收入明细查询

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select substr(cast(jxmx.tjrq as char(8)),1,6) as tjrq ,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,dkzh.khh,dkzh.zhhm,dmms.dmms as khlx, bz.bzzwmc,jxmx.jcbz,jxmx.tjxs,jxmx.khdkje,sum(jxmx.yslx) yslx,sum(jxmx.sslx) sslx,sum(jxmx.jlje) jlje from dkjx_dksslxjxmx jxmx inner join khdx_hy hy on jxmx.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh inner join jxdx_dkzh dkzh on jxmx.jxdxdh = dkzh.jxdxdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh inner join csb_dmms dmms on dmms.dmz = jxmx.zhbs and dmms.dmmc='ZHBS' inner join csb_bz bz on dkzh.bz = bz.bz where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and jxmx.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and jxmx.zhbs = '$zhbs$' and dkzh.zhhm like '%$zhhm$%' and jxmx.khdkje between $khdkjexx$ and $khdkjesx$ group by jxmx.tjrq ,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,dkzh.khh,dkzh.zhhm,dmms.dmms, bz.bzzwmc,jxmx.jcbz,jxmx.tjxs,jxmx.khdkje

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select substr(cast(jxmx.tjrq as char(8)),1,6) as tjrq ,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,dkzh.khh,dkzh.zhhm,dmms.dmms as khlx, bz.bzzwmc,jxmx.jcbz,jxmx.tjxs,jxmx.khdkje,sum(jxmx.yslx) yslx,sum(jxmx.sslx) sslx,sum(jxmx.jlje) jlje from dkjx_dksslxjxmx jxmx inner join khdx_hy hy on jxmx.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = hy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = jgcy.jgkhdxdh inner join jxdx_dkzh dkzh on jxmx.jxdxdh = dkzh.jxdxdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh inner join csb_dmms dmms on dmms.dmz = jxmx.zhbs and dmms.dmmc='ZHBS' inner join csb_bz bz on dkzh.bz = bz.bz where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and jxmx.tjrq = $tjrq_ym$ and jxmx.zhbs = '$zhbs$' and dkzh.zhhm like '%$zhhm$%' and jxmx.khdkje between $khdkjexx$ and $khdkjesx$ group by jxmx.tjrq ,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,dkzh.khh,dkzh.zhhm,dmms.dmms, bz.bzzwmc,jxmx.jcbz,jxmx.tjxs,jxmx.khdkje ) t
